item.title: Atomic Notes
item.description: Atomic note refer to ideas that are short and concise, but could also stand on their own without needing to refer to other ideas in order to make sense.

item.title: Digital Garden
item.description: Digital Garden What is digital gardening? If you don’t know what digital gardens are, just think of it as a personal Wikipedia, the end goal isn’t a perfectly written article, instead the process of slowly growing the interconnected knowledge is what digital gardening cares about.
